description: This file defines a Qwik component for rendering a flower generation UI with interactive controls and styling.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main Qwik component that manages state, lifecycle, and rendering logic.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that run when the component becomes visible, such as timers.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates a reactive state object with 'count' and 'number' properties.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped CSS styles imported from an external stylesheet.
